Bash(true sleep 2 timeout 120 /var/www/trading-x/backend/venv/bin/python3 -c "
import asyncio
from app.api.metaapi_service import startup_metaapi

async def test\(\):
    print\(''''Testing MetaAPI startup...''''\)
    try:
        result = await asyncio.wait_for\(startup_metaapi\(\), timeout=60\)
        print\(f''''Result: {result}''''\)
    except asyncio.TimeoutError:
        print\(''''TIMEOUT after 60 seconds''''\)
    except Exception as e:
        print\(f''''Error: {e}''''\)

asyncio.run\(test\(\)\)
")

Bash(head -10 __NEW_LINE_a3f55bb1790beace__ echo "" echo "=== 재시작 후 BTC D1 시간 순서 검증 ===" sleep 10 python3 -c "
import json, subprocess, datetime
raw = subprocess.getoutput\(''''curl -s ""http://localhost:8000/api/mt5/candles/BTCUSD?timeframe=D1&count=5""''''\)
data = json.loads\(raw\)
candles = data.get\(''''candles'''', []\)
print\(f''''BTC D1 캔들 수: {len\(candles\)}''''\)
if candles:
    ok = True
    for i, c in enumerate\(candles\):
        dt = datetime.datetime.utcfromtimestamp\(c[''''time'''']\)
        marker = ''''''''
        if i > 0 and c[''''time''''] <= candles[i-1][''''time'''']:
            marker = '''' ❌ 역순!''''
            ok = False
        print\(f''''  {dt} \(time={c[""time""]}\){marker}''''\)
    print\(f''''\\n시간 순서: {""✅ 정상"" if ok else ""❌ 역순 있음""} ''''\)
else:
    print\(''''⚠️ 캔들 없음 \(캐시 로딩 중일 수 있음\)''''\)
")
